G

Game - carte中的类
A class representing the game core of the game Shape up.
Game() - 类 的构造器carte.Game
This is the constructor of the class Game.
GameInterface - vue中的类
A class of Vue which offers game interface for users and communicates with Controller ControleurGame
GameInterface(Game) - 类 的构造器vue.GameInterface
This is the constructor of the class GameInterface.

This method judges if the card has been moved by the player.
